title: FPS DROP ISSUES
body:
Ive been having some weird fps drop issues ive removed the xbox bar and uninstalled the xbox app which worked for a while. I recently reset my computer just to clean it up and have a fresh start but im still having issues where my FPS drops to around 6 randomly and I have no idea why. Any help ? 
GeForce GTX 770
Intel i7-5820 3.30 GHz
15.83 GB ram
1920 x 1080 60Hz

replies.body: Disabling the game bar was a solid plan.  If you're reformatted, though, then your drivers may be out of date.  I suggest going over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up!  Let me know if you have any questions on this.
